column2: My liege, the Order of the Flaming Rose stand ready to serve you in defense against monsters! \n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Order of the Flaming Rose in their struggle against monsters and other evils, even though this will forever disinherit him.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Order of the Flaming Rose.

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
The Order of the Flaming Rose have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!

Your Highness, this extremely generous donation will not be forgotten. You have my friendship, as well as that of the Order.

With greatest gratitude,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Order serves the humanity, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order of the Flaming Rose have done their sacred duty, the fiends and monsters inhabiting [FromFromFrom.GetName] are no more.\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
